comments:
Build id: I20051122-0800
Open the editor of a product which is plug-ins based.
Switch to "features" based.
Click on the configuration page.You will notive that it comes out grey.

I've noticed two issues when switching between plugin and feature based products.
1. Configuration page goes grey
 To reproduce:
  - open product editor
  - switch to feature based
  - navigate to the configurations tab, then back to the overview tab
  - switch back to plugin based
  - navigate to the configurations tab (page should be grey)

2. Configuration page/tab completely dissapears
  - open product editor
  - switch to feature based
  - navigate to the configurations tab, then back to the overview tab
  - switch back to plugin based
  - switch back again to feature based (configuration tab should dissapear)
Forms didn't change since 3.1. Perhaps the SWT team should take a look first.

here is the stack.  You be the judge if it's swt or forms.

raising severity as it is happening all over the place in PDE editors now.

Another scenario:
1. Create an empty plugin with no extensions
2. go to the extensions page
3. create a new extension.
4. switch to the overview page.  it goes blank.

Found the problem in PDEFormPage. The shared menu is not reset before page disposal. This causes the menu to be disposed as well and it subsequently invalidates existing pages that still use it. 

Released the fix.
